title: cf.api\_gateway.request\_violates\_schema
content:
`cf.api_gateway.request_violates_schema` Boolean

Indicates whether the request [violated the schema](https://developers.cloudflare.com/api-shield/security/schema-validation/) assigned to the respective saved endpoint.
